AMENDED ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 1st day of June, 1998, we GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and we REVERSE the order of the Superior Court. We REMAND the matter to the Court of Common Pleas of Erie County consistent with this Court’s opinion in Jacobs v. Halloran, 551 Pa. 350, 710 A.2d 1098 (1998) and Marino v. Hackman, 551 Pa. 369, 710 A.2d 1108 (1998).
SAYLOR, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
